content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252172,"originalJapaneseLine":"あきたら俺達の者だ、可愛い子も多い嬲り殺してやろう","translatedEnglishLine":"If we get bored, we'll deal with our own. There are many cute girls we can torment to death."},{"lineNumber":252173,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘後発生します／汎用なので何度か起こります","translatedEnglishLine":"This occurs after battle / It's generic so it happens several times."},{"lineNumber":252174,"originalJapaneseLine":"必要なら初と汎用を作ってもらってもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"If necessary, you can create both initial and generic versions."},{"lineNumber":252175,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸＸＸ＝女の子は名前と立ち絵の存在です","translatedEnglishLine":"XXXX = the girl refers to the name and the existence of standing artwork."},{"lineNumber":252176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここ誰が入るかは後で調整します、今はＸＸＸとして","translatedEnglishLine":"Who goes here will be adjusted later; for now, use XXX."},{"lineNumber":252177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　適当な立ち絵を使って下さい、誰でも可能な感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Please use an appropriate standing illustration, something that could be anyone."},{"lineNumber":252178,"originalJapaneseLine":"　台詞等は入れない","translatedEnglishLine":"Do not include lines or dialogue."},{"lineNumber":252179,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の襲撃を撃退して一息つくシィル達","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru and the others take a breather after repelling the demon army's attack."},{"lineNumber":252180,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、後ろからこっそりアレフガルドが現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, Alefgard secretly appears from behind."},{"lineNumber":252181,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸＸを掠う、みんなが気がついた時にはもう逃げられた","translatedEnglishLine":"He snatches XXX; by the time everyone notices, he's already escaped."},{"lineNumber":252182,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＩＦ．健太郎がいる場合","translatedEnglishLine":"IF: If Kentaro is present."},{"lineNumber":252183,"originalJapaneseLine":"なお、ランスが石化されてからですが・・よく考えると","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Rance has been petrified... if you think about it carefully,"},{"lineNumber":252184,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎君が日光持っているので魔人と戦う事は可能です","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro-kun possesses sunlight, so it is possible to fight a demon."},{"lineNumber":252185,"originalJapaneseLine":"このあたり、少しふれてもいいかな、でも健太郎君魔人なので","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe we can touch on this a bit, but since Kentaro-kun is a demon,"},{"lineNumber":252186,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまり信用されていません","translatedEnglishLine":"he isn't trusted very much."},{"lineNumber":252187,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、ちらっと会話させるくらいで・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, just have a brief conversation or so..."},{"lineNumber":252188,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル他、みんなは魔人を倒す事よりランスを救出を考えています","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru and the others are thinking more about rescuing Rance than defeating the demon."},{"lineNumber":252189,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの本拠地","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa's stronghold."},{"lineNumber":252190,"originalJapaneseLine":"※ここの流れは任せる、なんかうまく考えて","translatedEnglishLine":"*I'll leave the flow here up to you; please figure something out well."},{"lineNumber":252191,"originalJapaneseLine":"※一応、こちらの案は書いているのが変更してもらってもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"*You may change this proposal as needed."},{"lineNumber":252192,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサとアレフガルドが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa and Alefgard are present."},{"lineNumber":252193,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲には石化された人間がいっぱい置かれている","translatedEnglishLine":"There are many petrified humans placed around."},{"lineNumber":252194,"originalJapaneseLine":"どれがランスか分からない。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's unclear which one is Rance."},{"lineNumber":252195,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサが戦う時、その邪魔をしないようにアレフガルドは戦わず見ています","translatedEnglishLine":"When Medusa fights, Alefgard watches without fighting so as not to interfere."},{"lineNumber":252196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（※何かアレフガルドがメディウサが死ぬまで動かないように仕掛け入れて）","translatedEnglishLine":"(*Alefgard has set some trap so that Medusa does not move until she dies.)"},{"lineNumber":252197,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":252198,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル隊長のメディウサ戦が始まって２ターン目","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the second turn since Captain Syiru's battle with Medusa began."},{"lineNumber":252199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252200,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの攻撃を避けながら、シィルは奥の部屋を見ている","translatedEnglishLine":"While dodging Medusa's attacks, Syiru looks into the inner room."},{"lineNumber":252201,"originalJapaneseLine":"複数の石像が並べられた部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"A room lined with multiple statues."},{"lineNumber":252202,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが言う、あの中にランスもいるのね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, 'Rance must be in there as well.'"},{ "lineNumber":252203, "originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかあの石像に近づいてランスを復活させたい所ね","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to somehow approach those statues and revive Rance."},{"lineNumber":252204,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの攻撃　おわっ・・とさける","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa attacks — 'Whoa!' someone yells while dodging."},{"lineNumber":252205,"originalJapaneseLine":"よそ見する余裕あるのかしら？ふふふふと楽しそうなメディウサ","translatedEnglishLine":"Does she really have the luxury to look away? Medusa laughs playfully."},{"lineNumber":252206,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの場合と同等","translatedEnglishLine":"Same as in the case of Kurukoo."},{"lineNumber":252207,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの場合と同等","translatedEnglishLine":"Same as in the case of Kurukoo."},{"lineNumber":252210,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの場合と同等","translatedEnglishLine":"Same as in the case of Kurukoo."},{"lineNumber":252211,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの場合（戦闘中に割り込みで発生）","translatedEnglishLine":"In the case of Kurukoo (occurs as an interruption during battle)."},{"lineNumber":252212,"originalJapaneseLine":"今なら石化されたランスさんに近寄れる・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Now we can get close to the petrified Rance..."},{"lineNumber":252213,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの脇を抜けて後ろにまわる、しかし目の前には十数体の石像","translatedEnglishLine":"We slip past Medusa's side and move behind, but in front are a dozen or so statues."},{"lineNumber":252214,"originalJapaneseLine":"どれがランスか分からない、考える、よく見るが、そんな時間は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"We don't know which is Rance, we think carefully and look closely, but there's no time."},{"lineNumber":252215,"originalJapaneseLine":"いったいの石像に状態回復の呪文をかける。が・・ただの一般人だった","translatedEnglishLine":"We cast a healing spell on one statue — but it was just an ordinary person."},{"lineNumber":252216,"originalJapaneseLine":"あーら、残念とふりむいたメディウサに倒される","translatedEnglishLine":"'Oh dear, too bad,' says Medusa as she turns and defeats us."},{"lineNumber":252217,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの場合（何人か失敗した後しか出ません）","translatedEnglishLine":"In Syiru's case (only appears after several failures)."},{"lineNumber":252218,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの脇を抜けて後ろに入るが、無理なタイミングで走ったので","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru slips past Medusa's side and moves behind, but because she ran at a bad timing,"},{"lineNumber":252219,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサに早くみつかり爪で少しひっかかれる、傷を負いながらも","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa quickly spots her and scratches her with claws — despite the wounds,"},{"lineNumber":252220,"originalJapaneseLine":"石像の所にいく・・　何体もあるのだが、シィルには分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru goes to the statues... there are many, but she knows which one."},{"lineNumber":252221,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこで状態回復の呪文をかけるとランスが蘇る。","translatedEnglishLine":"When she casts a healing spell there, Rance revives."},{"lineNumber":252222,"originalJapaneseLine":"よかったランス様と傷でぐったりと倒れるシィル","translatedEnglishLine":"'Thank goodness, Lord Rance,' Syiru says as she collapses weakly from her wounds."},{"lineNumber":252223,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを抱きしめながら、おのれ・・このビッチ","translatedEnglishLine":"Holding him, she mutters, 'Damn you... you bitch.'"},{"lineNumber":252224,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサはランスが蘇るなんて想像もしてなかったので後ろからの","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa never imagined Rance would revive, so from behind,"},{"lineNumber":252225,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの一撃をもろに受けてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"she takes Rance's blow full on."},{"lineNumber":252226,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中、石化から復活したランスが大活躍","translatedEnglishLine":"During the battle, Rance, revived from petrification, is very active."},{"lineNumber":252227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252228,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははははは、とメディウサを斬りつける","translatedEnglishLine":"'Gahahahaha!' he laughs as he slashes Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252229,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだか絶好調だ、石化が解けて何か身体が軽いぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"He feels great, like his body is lighter now that the petrification is gone."},{"lineNumber":252230,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスすごいなぁと誰かの感想。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone comments, 'Rance is amazing.'"},{ "lineNumber":252231, "originalJapaneseLine":"さすが唯一魔人を倒せる男よ","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected from the only man who can defeat demons."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あきたら俺達の者だ、可愛い子も多い嬲り殺してやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we get bored, we'll deal with our own. There are many cute girls we can torment to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘後発生します／汎用なので何度か起こります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This occurs after battle / It's generic so it happens several times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なら初と汎用を作ってもらってもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If necessary, you can create both initial and generic versions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸＸ＝女の子は名前と立ち絵の存在です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XXXX = the girl refers to the name and the existence of standing artwork.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ誰が入るかは後で調整します、今はＸＸＸとして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who goes here will be adjusted later; for now, use XXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適当な立ち絵を使って下さい、誰でも可能な感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please use an appropriate standing illustration, something that could be anyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 台詞等は入れない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do not include lines or dialogue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の襲撃を撃退して一息つくシィル達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru and the others take a breather after repelling the demon army's attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、後ろからこっそりアレフガルドが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, Alefgard secretly appears from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸを掠う、みんなが気がついた時にはもう逃げられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He snatches XXX; by the time everyone notices, he's already escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．健太郎がいる場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: IF: If Kentaro is present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なお、ランスが石化されてからですが・・よく考えると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Rance has been petrified... if you think about it carefully,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君が日光持っているので魔人と戦う事は可能です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro-kun possesses sunlight, so it is possible to fight a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたり、少しふれてもいいかな、でも健太郎君魔人なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe we can touch on this a bit, but since Kentaro-kun is a demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり信用されていません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he isn't trusted very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ちらっと会話させるくらいで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, just have a brief conversation or so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル他、みんなは魔人を倒す事よりランスを救出を考えています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru and the others are thinking more about rescuing Rance than defeating the demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの本拠地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa's stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここの流れは任せる、なんかうまく考えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *I'll leave the flow here up to you; please figure something out well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※一応、こちらの案は書いているのが変更してもらってもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *You may change this proposal as needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサとアレフガルドが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa and Alefgard are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲には石化された人間がいっぱい置かれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are many petrified humans placed around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれがランスか分からない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unclear which one is Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサが戦う時、その邪魔をしないようにアレフガルドは戦わず見ています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Medusa fights, Alefgard watches without fighting so as not to interfere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※何かアレフガルドがメディウサが死ぬまで動かないように仕掛け入れて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (*Alefgard has set some trap so that Medusa does not move until she dies.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル隊長のメディウサ戦が始まって２ターン目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the second turn since Captain Syiru's battle with Medusa began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの攻撃を避けながら、シィルは奥の部屋を見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While dodging Medusa's attacks, Syiru looks into the inner room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 複数の石像が並べられた部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A room lined with multiple statues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、あの中にランスもいるのね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'Rance must be in there as well.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかあの石像に近づいてランスを復活させたい所ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to somehow approach those statues and revive Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの攻撃　おわっ・・とさける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa attacks — 'Whoa!' someone yells while dodging.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よそ見する余裕あるのかしら？ふふふふと楽しそうなメディウサ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does she really have the luxury to look away? Medusa laughs playfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合（戦闘中に割り込みで発生）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the case of Kurukoo (occurs as an interruption during battle).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今なら石化されたランスさんに近寄れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now we can get close to the petrified Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの脇を抜けて後ろにまわる、しかし目の前には十数体の石像
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We slip past Medusa's side and move behind, but in front are a dozen or so statues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれがランスか分からない、考える、よく見るが、そんな時間は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't know which is Rance, we think carefully and look closely, but there's no time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったいの石像に状態回復の呪文をかける。が・・ただの一般人だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cast a healing spell on one statue — but it was just an ordinary person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あーら、残念とふりむいたメディウサに倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Oh dear, too bad,' says Medusa as she turns and defeats us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの場合（何人か失敗した後しか出ません）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Syiru's case (only appears after several failures).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの脇を抜けて後ろに入るが、無理なタイミングで走ったので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru slips past Medusa's side and moves behind, but because she ran at a bad timing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサに早くみつかり爪で少しひっかかれる、傷を負いながらも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa quickly spots her and scratches her with claws — despite the wounds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石像の所にいく・・　何体もあるのだが、シィルには分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru goes to the statues... there are many, but she knows which one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで状態回復の呪文をかけるとランスが蘇る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When she casts a healing spell there, Rance revives.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったランス様と傷でぐったりと倒れるシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Thank goodness, Lord Rance,' Syiru says as she collapses weakly from her wounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを抱きしめながら、おのれ・・このビッチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Holding him, she mutters, 'Damn you... you bitch.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサはランスが蘇るなんて想像もしてなかったので後ろからの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa never imagined Rance would revive, so from behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの一撃をもろに受けてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she takes Rance's blow full on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、石化から復活したランスが大活躍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the battle, Rance, revived from petrification, is very active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははは、とメディウサを斬りつける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahahahaha!' he laughs as he slashes Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか絶好調だ、石化が解けて何か身体が軽いぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He feels great, like his body is lighter now that the petrification is gone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスすごいなぁと誰かの感想。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone comments, 'Rance is amazing.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが唯一魔人を倒せる男よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected from the only man who can defeat demons.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あきたら俺達の者だ、可愛い子も多い嬲り殺してやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we get bored, we'll deal with our own. There are many cute girls we can torment to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘後発生します／汎用なので何度か起こります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This occurs after battle / It's generic so it happens several times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なら初と汎用を作ってもらってもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If necessary, you can create both initial and generic versions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸＸ＝女の子は名前と立ち絵の存在です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XXXX = the girl refers to the name and the existence of standing artwork.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ誰が入るかは後で調整します、今はＸＸＸとして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who goes here will be adjusted later; for now, use XXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適当な立ち絵を使って下さい、誰でも可能な感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please use an appropriate standing illustration, something that could be anyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 台詞等は入れない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do not include lines or dialogue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の襲撃を撃退して一息つくシィル達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru and the others take a breather after repelling the demon army's attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、後ろからこっそりアレフガルドが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, Alefgard secretly appears from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸを掠う、みんなが気がついた時にはもう逃げられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He snatches XXX; by the time everyone notices, he's already escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．健太郎がいる場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: IF: If Kentaro is present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なお、ランスが石化されてからですが・・よく考えると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Rance has been petrified... if you think about it carefully,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君が日光持っているので魔人と戦う事は可能です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro-kun possesses sunlight, so it is possible to fight a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたり、少しふれてもいいかな、でも健太郎君魔人なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe we can touch on this a bit, but since Kentaro-kun is a demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり信用されていません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he isn't trusted very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ちらっと会話させるくらいで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, just have a brief conversation or so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル他、みんなは魔人を倒す事よりランスを救出を考えています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru and the others are thinking more about rescuing Rance than defeating the demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの本拠地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa's stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここの流れは任せる、なんかうまく考えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *I'll leave the flow here up to you; please figure something out well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※一応、こちらの案は書いているのが変更してもらってもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *You may change this proposal as needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサとアレフガルドが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa and Alefgard are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲には石化された人間がいっぱい置かれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are many petrified humans placed around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれがランスか分からない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unclear which one is Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサが戦う時、その邪魔をしないようにアレフガルドは戦わず見ています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Medusa fights, Alefgard watches without fighting so as not to interfere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※何かアレフガルドがメディウサが死ぬまで動かないように仕掛け入れて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (*Alefgard has set some trap so that Medusa does not move until she dies.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル隊長のメディウサ戦が始まって２ターン目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the second turn since Captain Syiru's battle with Medusa began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの攻撃を避けながら、シィルは奥の部屋を見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While dodging Medusa's attacks, Syiru looks into the inner room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 複数の石像が並べられた部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A room lined with multiple statues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、あの中にランスもいるのね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'Rance must be in there as well.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかあの石像に近づいてランスを復活させたい所ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to somehow approach those statues and revive Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの攻撃　おわっ・・とさける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa attacks — 'Whoa!' someone yells while dodging.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よそ見する余裕あるのかしら？ふふふふと楽しそうなメディウサ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does she really have the luxury to look away? Medusa laughs playfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合と同等
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same as in the case of Kurukoo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの場合（戦闘中に割り込みで発生）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the case of Kurukoo (occurs as an interruption during battle).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今なら石化されたランスさんに近寄れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now we can get close to the petrified Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの脇を抜けて後ろにまわる、しかし目の前には十数体の石像
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We slip past Medusa's side and move behind, but in front are a dozen or so statues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれがランスか分からない、考える、よく見るが、そんな時間は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't know which is Rance, we think carefully and look closely, but there's no time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったいの石像に状態回復の呪文をかける。が・・ただの一般人だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cast a healing spell on one statue — but it was just an ordinary person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あーら、残念とふりむいたメディウサに倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Oh dear, too bad,' says Medusa as she turns and defeats us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの場合（何人か失敗した後しか出ません）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Syiru's case (only appears after several failures).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの脇を抜けて後ろに入るが、無理なタイミングで走ったので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru slips past Medusa's side and moves behind, but because she ran at a bad timing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサに早くみつかり爪で少しひっかかれる、傷を負いながらも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa quickly spots her and scratches her with claws — despite the wounds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石像の所にいく・・　何体もあるのだが、シィルには分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru goes to the statues... there are many, but she knows which one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで状態回復の呪文をかけるとランスが蘇る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When she casts a healing spell there, Rance revives.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったランス様と傷でぐったりと倒れるシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Thank goodness, Lord Rance,' Syiru says as she collapses weakly from her wounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを抱きしめながら、おのれ・・このビッチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Holding him, she mutters, 'Damn you... you bitch.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサはランスが蘇るなんて想像もしてなかったので後ろからの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa never imagined Rance would revive, so from behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの一撃をもろに受けてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she takes Rance's blow full on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、石化から復活したランスが大活躍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the battle, Rance, revived from petrification, is very active.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははは、とメディウサを斬りつける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahahahaha!' he laughs as he slashes Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか絶好調だ、石化が解けて何か身体が軽いぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He feels great, like his body is lighter now that the petrification is gone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスすごいなぁと誰かの感想。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone comments, 'Rance is amazing.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが唯一魔人を倒せる男よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected from the only man who can defeat demons.
